segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sārajjaṃ okkanto hoti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is overcome by timidity.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, appassuto hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is faithless, unethical, with little learning, lazy, and witless.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sārajjaṃ okkanto hoti.
segments.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is overcome by timidity.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu visārado hoti.
segments.en: A mendicant with five qualities is self-assured.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, bahussuto hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, ethical, learned, energetic, and wise.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu visārado hotī”ti.
segments.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is self-assured.”
